CustomField.description: This field when selected and in conjunction with 'Include In Dues' in fee will add charge amounts to bill, thereby increasing bill amounts. Delinquent Amount will increase by the fees billed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field when selected and in conjunction with 'Include In Dues' in fee will add charge amounts to bill, thereby increasing bill amounts. Delinquent Amount will increase by the fees billed.
CustomField.label: Add Fee Amount To Bill
